features.title: Fix Copy Button Dark Mode Visibility
features.description: Add text color to copy button so it's visible in dark mode
acceptance_criteria: Copy button text is visible in dark mode
Copy button uses var(--text-primary) for color
features.verification: bun run viewer & sleep 2 && echo 'Visual inspection required'

features.title: Clean Up JSON Display Paths
features.description: Remove escape characters and use relative paths with ~ for home directory in JSON display
acceptance_criteria: Home directory paths display as ~/... instead of full path
Backslashes are converted to forward slashes
JSON remains properly formatted and syntax highlighted
features.verification: bun run viewer & sleep 2 && echo 'Visual inspection required'

features.title: Move Session Dropdown Below Search
features.description: Reorder filter bar so session dropdown appears below search box
acceptance_criteria: Search box and event filter appear on first row
Session dropdown appears on second row below search
features.verification: bun run viewer & sleep 2 && echo 'Visual inspection required'

features.title: Fix Footer Always Visible
features.description: Use flexbox layout to ensure footer stays at bottom of viewport
acceptance_criteria: Footer is always visible at bottom of viewport
Log list scrolls within available space
Footer doesn't get pushed off screen with many entries
features.verification: bun run viewer & sleep 2 && echo 'Visual inspection required'

features.title: E2E Validation with Playwright
features.description: Verify all UI changes work correctly using Playwright browser automation
acceptance_criteria: Copy button is visible and clickable in dark mode
JSON paths show ~ prefix for home directory
Session dropdown is below search box
Footer is visible at bottom of page
